headline: Easy Hoppin' John
name: Easy Hoppin' John
description: This easy Hoppin' John recipe uses canned black-eyed peas and instant rice to make a quicker version of the beloved Southern dish in under an hour.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound smoked beef sausage, cut into bite-size pieces
3 (15 ounce) cans black-eyed peas, rinsed and drained
2 (10.75 ounce) cans low sodium chicken stock
0.5 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place sausage and onion into a large saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until sausage begins to brown, about 10 minutes.
Stir in black-eyed peas, chicken stock, water, and cayenne pepper, and bring to a boil. Stir in rice; cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until rice is tender, 20 to 25 minutes.
